Mathematics of computing.reason: Channel orthogonality analysis implied in user matching but no explicit mathematical modeling or theoretical analysis presented.

Information systems.reason: No relation to database systems, information retrieval, or knowledge management systems.

Human-centered computing.reason: Technical network protocol paper without HCI components or user experience considerations.
